summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bates Motel
Review Date: 2017/05/18
Categories: Suspense, Horror, Drama
Product Description: ["Emmy-nominated actress Vera Farmiga returns for double duty as executive producer while also reprising her role as 'Mother’ who is very much alive and well but only in the twisted, complicated mind of 'Norman Bates’ played by Freddie Highmore. Grammy Award winner and series super fan Rihanna checks in to play the role of 'Marion Crane,’ putting a newly reimagined spin on the iconic character."]
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tucker Gates', 'Ed Bianchi', 'Phil Abraham', 'Nestor Carbonell', 'Tim Southam', 'Sarah Boyd', 'Roxann Dawson', 'Christopher Nelson', 'Olatunde Osunsanmi', 'S.J. Clarkson'], 'Starring': ['Vera Farmiga', 'Freddie Highmore', 'Max Thieriot']}
Review Text: loved the show and enjoyed every episode for FREE!!  Another attack by "AMAZON DIGITAL SERVICES"  Beware they start with small fee's  1.99,2.99 to check your attention that they do a fast series of 8.99,12,99,14,99 etc.... I am 1 of millions of Bates fans why the hell would I purchase season 5 and that's it?  AMAZON DIGITAL SERVICE>>>>>SCAM>>>>BEWARE>>>>>it may not show up on your bill as anything but a fee....that will grow and grow until you DO SOMETHING!
Review Title: AMAZON DIGITAL SERVICE  SCAM ALERT!!!!  Look it up and learn and help us stop it now!!

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user displays a strong appreciation for engaging and thrilling content, evident through multiple reviews expressing enjoyment of various shows. High ratings signify satisfaction with the quality of drama, suspense, and nature-themed programming. The user enjoys immersive storytelling and character development, particularly noting the captivating nature of the content available. Positive feedback includes admiration for narrative depth and the overall viewing experience.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
The user repeatedly expresses frustration regarding billing practices associated with digital services. Numerous comments highlight unauthorized charges and automatic billing without consent, leading to a negative perception of the provider. Users feel misled, reporting complications related to receiving purchased content and a lack of customer service options. This dissatisfaction is compounded by perceptions of scams, prompting warnings for others considering similar services.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's experience showcases a clear dichotomy between enjoyment of quality content and significant frustration over billing issues. While they express satisfaction with the engaging nature and quality of the shows, they are deeply troubled by the billing processes of digital services. The overall sentiment indicates a love for immersive storytelling but a strong aversion to perceived unethical practices by the service provider. This duality suggests that while the content meets expectations, the logistical hurdles detract from the overall enjoyment.

target_interaction.text: I think they wish I was a Stepford Wife but I am not. Or am I a Extra Large Stepford wife. I am not even a wife. Amazon has Amazoned my life.All females are Large and extra large.Me, gifts for gal friends, daughters,grand babied are Amazon Sized.
